alert.note: Alert for Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 9:28AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON... SOUTHWESTERN GALVESTON...BRAZORIA AND MATAGORDA COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 AM CDT... At 927 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near San Luis Pass to 9 miles east of Sargent to 6 miles east of Indianola. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galveston Island West End, Matagorda, Lake Jackson, Alvin, Angleton, Bay City, Freeport, Clute, Hitchcock, Palacios, West Columbia, Sweeny, Surfside Beach, South Texas Nuclear Plant, Richwood, Brazoria, Jones Creek, Danbury, Oyster Creek, and Holiday Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
